member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_SERIALIZATION
member.summary: Indicates the level of support for heap serialization.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_SERIALIZATION.NodeIndex
member.summary: An input field, indicating the adapter index to query.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_SERIALIZATION.HeapSerializationTier
member.summary: An output field, indicating the tier of heap serialization support.
